div.pre: 2166 Sicily, c. 1955 Burial: 350-300 B.C. (K) Contents: 25+ AR Pegasi: 6 st.; 17 dr.; 2 fr. (most 4th cent.) Disposition: Agrigento Griffo, AIIN 1955, pp. 199-200 Jenkins, Gela, p. 157 Confiscated at same time as S.
